content.rendered:
Compact and portable, this powerful yet affordable myCOOLMAN 47-litre fridge is the perfect take-along for your next adventure, whether having a few drinks with friends in the backyard, camping on a riverbank or blazing a trail through the outback.

Showcasing our patented variable speed Blue-Gen compressor which operates on 12/24V and 240V, the fridge comes with 3-level battery protection, digital display with Turbo mode for faster cool down, and a two-way opening lid for convenience.

Built to last , the fridge can be used every day while being small enough to allow easy storage when not in use.

  • Litre Capacity – 47 Litres
  • Can Capacity – 56 x (375ml)
  • Compressor – Blue Gen Compact compressor (variable speed)
  • Warranty – 3 Years
  • Power sources – 12/24vDC – 240vAC (Auto changeover mains priority)
  • Battery protection – 3 level
  • LED interior light
  • 2-way reversible lid (tool-free)
  • DC socket – Single
  • Digital display (with “Turbo” function)
  • Removable handles – (Double as tie-downs)
